Articles.Content: Is there any known program or mod that helps calculate gravity assists in Realism Overhaul? Large formulas are way to much for me and maneuver nodes don't calculate for entering 4 or 5 different SOIs.

and maneuver nodes don't calculate for entering 4 or 5 different SOIs.

Open the settings.cfg and edit the value for "CONIC_PATCH_LIMIT".
